node.title: Severe weather may complicate grim search for bodies of campers Russell Hill and Carol Clay
node.alt: Some police tape is hung between trees on a wet, muddy unsealed road
node.description: Wet weather may hinder the search for the remains of Russel Hill and Carol Clay in the state's rugged terrain, expertÂ says
node.content:
["Wet weather may hinder the search for the remains of Russel Hill and Carol Clay in Victoria's rugged terrain, an expert says.", "Mr Hill and Ms Clay went missing in March 2020 during a camping trip in the remote bushland of the Wonangatta Valley \u2014 an area largely uncharted even by the most experienced\u00a0bush lovers.", "On Thursday, police said they had established an alleged crime scene\u00a0in the Great Alpine region, with forensic specialists to start combing the region area.", "However,\u00a0Victorian National Parks Association executive director Matt Ruchel said the terrain in the region\u00a0could be quite unforgiving in wet weather.", "\"I think [the] police have certainly got their work cut out for them,\" Mr Ruchel said.", "
Mammoth job ahead in Victoria's roughest terrain
", "On Thursday, parts of Victoria's high country near Falls Creek and Mount Hotham received maximum rainfall averages of about 30 millimetres.", "Strong winds of up to 80kph and peak gusts of about 100kph\u00a0are expected to thrash Mount Hotham and\u00a0other parts of the Alpine region on Saturday", "\"It's been pretty wet and there's a lot of water coming down from New South Wales,\" Mr Ruchel said.", "\"And certainly when it's wet the rivers can flow quite quickly and you can get lots of trees falling down across tracks and trails.\"", "Victoria Police Assistant Commissioner Bob Hill said in a media conference that investigators from the Missing Persons Squad would be supported by forensic and search and rescue teams.", "\"The investigation is far from over.\"", "
Trailer may reveal missing piece of the puzzle
", "", "
Police say the vehicle was spotted on cameras at the top of Mount Hotham.(Supplied: Victoria Police)
", "Caroline Springs man Gregory Stewart Lynn, 55,\u00a0was charged with two counts of murder on Thursday.", "He has been remanded in custody until May next year for a committal hearing. No plea was entered.", "Specialist operations officers arrested Mr Lynn at a remote campsite on Monday at Arbuckle Junction \u2013 more than an hour-and-a-half drive south of where Mr Hill and Ms Clay were last seen alive in the Wonangatta Valley.", "Police seized his beige four-wheel-drive\u00a0Nissan Patrol, which was the same model as the vehicle detectives were searching for earlier this month.", "Now police are calling on the public to help locate a silver-blue metal trailer believed to be attached to the vehicle allegedly spotted in the valley during the time the pair vanished.", "Assistant Commissioner Hill said he believed the trailer was sold on the online marketplace Gumtree between March and July 2020.", "\"There's been hundreds of people we've spoken to, hundreds of vehicles that have been eliminated \u2026 an excess of 1,000 information reports are in the system that we've been required to investigate,\" he said."]
